attributes.action: help us to defend our selves and our property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like a law to be passed allowing individuals the right to incappacitate and detain criminals  committing crimes against them until the police arrive,even if they are no longer committing the crime (ie: leaving the scene).this should be regardless of their age(obviously they would need to be of an age that understands right from wrong) ,gender or ethnic origin.with out the fear of criminal or civil prossicution in the event of any injury . 
as most of us don't know the names or addresses of the people committing these acts,it would appear this is nessesary for the police to assist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
